SELECT date_range.date AS date, COUNT(members.member_date) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY, INTERVAL (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY member_date ASC) - 1) DAY) AS date FROM members WHERE member_date BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 20 DAY AND CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY ORDER BY date ASC ) AS date_range LEFT JOIN members ON DATE(members.member_date) = DATE(date_range.date) GROUP BY date_range.date ORDER BY date_range.date ASC;

SELECT date_range.date AS date, IFNULL(sum(payments.payment_total_price), 0) AS revenue FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY payment_datetime ASC) - 1) DAY) AS date FROM payments WHERE payment_datetime BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 10 DAY) AND CURDATE() ORDER BY date ASC ) AS date_range LEFT JOIN payments ON DATE(payments.payment_datetime) = DATE(date_range.date) GROUP BY date_range.date HAVING date_range.date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 10 DAY) ORDER BY date_range.date ASC;
